roleset.name: pour liquid from bottle into pitcher

example.name: and now you learned something today
example.text: Decanting old wine aerates it fully ; it may also be -- practically speaking -- a matter of good economy .

example.name: and again
example.text: Thus , red wine must , if possible , never be disturbed or shaken ; very old red wine is often decanted so that the puckering , bitter elements which have settled to the bottom will not be mingled with the wine itself .

propbank.arg: so that the puckering , bitter elements which have settled to the bottom will not be mingled with the wine itself

roleset.note: DECANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'decant' based on sentences in brown. (from decant.01-v predicate notes)
